preferencesTitle.message: What do you want to skip?

relaxAndEnjoy.message:
You can now relax and enjoy watching movies as usual! We will automagically skip any unwanted scene.
On every movie, we will let you know if it is:

cut.message: Cut: All unwanted scenes will be skipped.

unsafe.message: Unsafe: Beware! We can't skip all unwanted scenes yet.

unknown.message: Unknown: Careful! Movie might have unwanted scenes.

noFilters.message: No filters for this film. Be the first one to add one!

clickToStartFilter.message: Click to start a new filter (Alt+N)
